text:
## Conversation Summary

### What We Did
We successfully implemented all requested changes to the TruckVisualization component and Diagnostic page:

1. **TruckVisualization.tsx updates completed:**
   - Made "покрутить" button text black with white background
   - Updated default 3D settings: Rotation X: -90°, Y: 55°, Z: 0°; Position X: 51%, Y: 35%; Scale: 70%
   - Added vehicle type dropdown between controls and 3D visualization
   - Set "Форд Транзит" as default vehicle type
   - Created dynamic vehicle dimensions system that updates all calculations based on selected vehicle type

2. **Diagnostic page enhancements completed:**
   - Added "Типы автомобилей" section with vehicle management functionality
   - Pre-populated with two test vehicles: "Форд Транзит" (4200×2025×2025mm) and "Фура 18м3" (4200×2200×2000mm)
   - Implemented add/remove vehicle types functionality
   - Added real-time volume calculation display
   - Created editable input fields for vehicle dimensions and names

### Current Task in Progress
The user has requested adding a "сохранить" (Save) button next to vehicle dimensions in the Diagnostic section to allow saving changes to vehicle dimensions and names.

### Files Currently Being Modified
- **Primary:** `/app/diagnostic/page.tsx` - Adding save functionality to vehicle types management
- **Secondary:** `/components/TruckVisualization.tsx` - Already updated with dynamic vehicle system

### What We're Going to Do Next
1. Add a "Сохранить" button to each vehicle type card in the diagnostic page
2. Implement save functionality to persist vehicle changes
3. Add visual feedback for successful saves
4. Ensure the save button updates the vehicle data properly

### Technical Context
- The vehicle management system is already functional with add/edit/remove capabilities
- Dynamic vehicle dimensions are working across the entire 3D visualization system
- All tasks from the todo list have been completed except for adding the save functionality
